root: ^You step through the portal and find yourself sitting in the pews of a well lit church.
^As you take in your grand surroundings, relaxing into your seat,
^your hear beside you an angelic, velvety voice.
^"Welcome, weary traveller, to our Church of JOI."
^The beautiful nun looks at you with sultry eyes, and a tender smile.
^"Have you come to pray? Or perhaps..."
^Her eyes slide downward to your exposed erection.
